article_title: Obamacare: Why the Health Care Law Could Increase Costs for Patients

twitter.description:
A key part of the efforts to reform health care and control medical costs may actually have the opposite effect, a new report says.

twitter.title: Here’s one way Obamacare is backfiring

article_metadata.description: As the Affordable Care Act encourages hospitals to buy doctors' offices, physicians have become "the hospital's sales force," raising costs.
